mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT u.user_no as userNo, u.user_name as userName, u.user_photo as userPhoto, u.user_Email as userEmail, c.comment_no as commentNo, c.comment_regdate as commentRegdate, c.comment_contents as commentContents FROM comment c JOIN task t ON c.task_no = t.task_no JOIN user u ON c.user_no = u.user_no WHERE c.task_no = #{taskNo} AND t.task_state!='del' AND c.comment_state = 'T';
mapper.insert:
